summary: CHEVY TRAILBLAZER 2002 INSTRUMENT PANEL MALFUNCTION:  OIL GAUGE DROPS TO ZERO WHEN IDLING- IS INTERMITTENT.  I THOUGHT THE OIL PUMP WAS FAILING AND PAID TO HAVE TOWED TO MECHANIC.  THEY SAID THAT INSTRUMENT PANEL HAS GLITCH IN IT SO YOU CANNOT TELL IF OIL PRESSURE IS ACCURATE.  CAR IS RUNNING FINE.  *TR
